name: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka

quotes.show: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
quotes.quote: In the end, guilt is just the question of whether you're capable of forgiving yourself or not. If you've really changed, then prove it with your actions.

quotes.show: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
quotes.quote: When you're just starting out, put all your energy into surviving. No matter how pathetic you feel, or how people laugh at you, if you come back alive, you win.

quotes.show: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
quotes.quote: I don't want to be a loser who can't do anything but talk. I don't want to be somebody who can sacrifice others, but won't risk himself.

quotes.show: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
quotes.quote: If I don't stand up here... If I don't reach higher here... When am I ever going to do it?

quotes.show: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
quotes.quote: Humility is a virtue, but do not insult yourself.

quotes.show: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
quotes.quote: Don't make yourself weigh your pride against your friends.

quotes.show: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
quotes.quote: We've never worked together before, so don't worry about teamwork! Just stay out of each other's way. Fight the way you want to fight!

quotes.show: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
quotes.quote: I wanted to save you because you're you. I didn't want you to leave, because you're you. I can't find another reason. I don't need another reason to save you.

quotes.show: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
quotes.quote: Listen, girls like guys who are strong and can protect them. So if you keep working hard and get stronger, she just might like you back.

quotes.show: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
quotes.quote: I can't forgive myself. I wanted something to happen without doing anything myself! I have to do it. I have to do it all... Or I can't even stand by her side!
